message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
I think we can do better than that, let's try a 55/45 split in my favor.
Bob, my turn. Time is money, and we're both losing out. I'll take a small hit, 55/45.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I think I can do a bit better. How about 57/43?
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We need to settle this now before inflation eats up all the profit. 52/48, my final offer.
